tags: it was a secret santa gift
summary: the best thing i ever did - SammyD - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
title: the best thing i ever did - SammyD - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
“So I’ve been thinking-”

“Sounds dangerous.”

“Shush. Anyways,” Hizashi began. “Since we won’t be seeing each other on Christmas, I figured we should meet up the day before to exchange our gifts!”

Shouta looked up at his friend and tried to hold back his smile as he looked at his excited expression. His whole body was practically on top of their lunch table as he leaned forward to invade Shouta’s personal space.

“And what makes you think I’m getting you anything in the first place?” Shouta asked.

“That is the most illogical thing you’ve ever said.” Hizashi sighed. “Anyways, it’ll be fun. Two bros getting each other something nice, right?”

“Never call me that again.”

As it turns out, Shouta and Hizashi know each other way better than they thought they did

summary: In the Shadows of Flames - Chapter 1 - WriterElemental - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our...
title: In the Shadows of Flames - Chapter 1 - WriterElemental - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/?
Fandom: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto, Bakugou Katsuki & Midoriya Izuku, Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou
Characters: Midoriya Izuku, Todoroki Shouto, Todoroki Enji | Endeavor, Bakugou Katsuki, Bakugou Mitsuki, Bakugou Masaru
Additional Tags: Will tag more characters and relationships as they come out, Demon!Midoriya, Half-Demon!Bakugou, Magic, Implied/Referenced Child Abuse, Not actually featuring it but they are going to be referring to it, Slow Burn-ish, The friendship between Bakugou & Midoriya is eventual
Summary:

Shouto’s mother only had two basic rules. Don’t ever fall in love, and never summon a demon. Rather strange advice to give to a child, and magic was a myth. Sure, Quirks were powerful but they weren’t MAGIC, magic wasn’t real… right? So why was she given him advice that he definitely wasn’t breaking by summoning a demon to help him deal with his father? And why was this bright little demon so very different from everything he’d heard about demons?

title: Heyo!
body:
Just wanted to give a heads up, I’m about to post a new fanfic on AO3, and I’m gonna link it here! Here’s the summary to give you an idea what’s coming!

“Shouto’s mother only had two basic rules. Don’t ever fall in love, and never summon a demon. Rather strange advice to give to a child, and magic was a myth. Sure, Quirks were powerful but they weren’t MAGIC, magic wasn’t real… right? So why was she given him advice that he definitely wasn’t breaking by summoning a demon to help him deal with his father? And why was this bright little demon so very different from everything he’d heard about demons?”

reblog.comment:

And why was this bright little demon so very different from everything he’d heard about demons?”
